text: Horsfieldia grandis is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is found in Indonesia, Malaysia, and Singapore. ==References== * de Wilde, W.J.J.O. 1998. Horsfieldia grandis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Horsfieldia grandis
